classmethod from_mnemonic(words: str)[source]

Create a wallet from an existing mnemonic phrase.

words – String of 12 words separated by spaces.

Configured wallet object.

Create a wallet from an existing private key.

private_key – Private key as a hexadecimal string.

Returns:

static get_dag_address_from_public_key_hex(public_key_hex: str) → str[source]
Parameters:

public_key_hex – The private key as a hexadecimal string.

Returns:

The DAG address corresponding to the public key (node ID).

static get_mnemonic_from_input() → str[source]

Mostly for testing purposes. Prompts the user to enter a mnemonic seed phrase.

Returns:

A mnemonic phrase from user input (should be validated).

get_pending_transaction(transaction_hash: str)[source]

Asynchronous method (used with await)

Parameters:

transaction_hash

Returns:

Async task: pending transaction

send(tx: TransactionV2)[source]

Asynchronous method (used with await). Sends the transaction using the current wallet configuration.

Parameters:

tx – Transaction object.

Returns:

Response from the configured API.

set_api(network=None, layer=None)[source]

Change the current network config. Choose the network associated with the wallet.

Parameters:

  • network – The network API to use with the wallet.

  • layer – The layer to use with the wallet.

Returns:

Configured wallet object.

async transaction(to_address: str, amount: float, fee: float = 0.0) → TransactionV2[source]
Parameters:

  • to_address – The address to receive transaction

  • amount – Quantity to send to the address

  • fee – Tip the network

Returns:

TransactionV2 object
